issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
It is failed to add eclipse sftp plus :  SFTP Plug-in from  http://eclipse.jcraft.com/ , which is ok in Titianium studio.



h3. Actual Result

An error occurred while installing the items
session context was:(profile=profile, phase=org.eclipse.equinox.internal.p2.engine.phases.Install, operand=null --> [R]com.jcraft.eclipse.team.sftp 0.0.4, action=).
Failed to prepare partial IU: [R]com.jcraft.eclipse.team.sftp 0.0.4.

h3. Expected Result
installed
fields.summary: Can not add sftp plus into appceletor studio 4.0.1

comments.body:
[~aee] we can not reproduce this issue, please share more information with us 

Thanks
It is under mac os 10.10.3 , have you tried mac os?
[~aee] yes we tried on mac, same version as you, we need more info
